price: 17. Мре soki bapesi moko kati na bango sango ya maye bazali kopesa na Ar-Rahmân(1) (Allah) (тропа kobotama ya mwana mwasi), okomona elongi naye ekomi moyindo na mawa. (etondi na pizoli na kosilika)
arabic: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِمَا ضَرَبَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مَثَلٗا ظَلَّ وَجۡهُهُۥ مُسۡوَدّٗا وَهُوَ كَظِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
